mapper.select: SELECT board.boardImagePath, board.boardTitle, Kategory.KategoryName as KategoryName, board.boardDate, board.boardHitCnt FROM board JOIN Kategory Kategory ON boardKategory = Kategory.KategoryNum WHERE boardUserId = #{userId}

SELECT board.boardTitle,location.locationName as locationName,board.boardProPrice, state.stateName as stateName, board.boardImagePath,Kategory.KategoryName as KategoryName, file.filePath as filePath FROM board JOIN location ON boardUserCheck = location.locationNum JOIN State ON boardProState = State.stateNum JOIN Kategory ON boardKategory = Kategory.KategoryNum JOIN file ON boardNum = file.fileBoardNum WHERE boardUserId = #{userId}
SELECT boardNum, boardImagePath, boardKategory, boardTitle, boardDate, boardProPrice, boardUserCheck, boardProState FROM board WHERE boardUserId = 'aaa' AND boardType='P'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(userName, userId, userPw, userTel, userEmail, userAdd1, userAdd2) VALUES (#{userName},#{userId},#{userPw},#{userTel},#{userEmail},#{userAdd1},#{userAdd2})
